::Firearm/Rex::

Rex throws himself at the ground as the weapons explode, Firearm doing the 
same. The explosion sends shrapnel flying into both Maximals' backs, then 
sending them sliding a few feet.

"IDIOT!" Rex snaps as he stands up, looking a at Firearm.

Firearm looks back at him, standing up, "You told me to get rid of them!"

"Them. Not us," Rex says, "Lets see how the prisoners are."

Rex walks over to the bounty hunters, checking to see if they're conscious, 
while Firearm walks to what's left of the weapons, looking at the smoking 
pile with pride.
